                    <div class="ic-element" id="wb_element_text__9451236339">
                     <div>
                      <p>
                       Learn everything you need to know to look great and feel confident in any situation, from the boardroom to a first date by understanding fashion and making the most of your look and lifestyle.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       New updated and revised edition of
                       <i>
                        Always In Style.
                       </i>
                       Make the most of your unique style. Save time and money by looking and feeling your best.
                      </p>
                      <p editor_id="mce_editor_0">
                       Order your copy today and save 25% using the code AIS2011
                      </p>
                      <p editor_id="mce_editor_0">
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       CLICK HERE:
                       <a href="http://www.axzopress.com/262/975/1-4260-1961-0.aspx">
                        http://www.axzopress.com/262/975/1-4260-1961-0.aspx
                       </a>
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </td>
                  </tr>
                 </table>
                </td>
                <td class="wb_col" id="wb_col__93355554569" style="" valign="top" width="26%">
                 <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_text__1303840578347_76" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                   <td align="left">
                    <div class="ic-element" id="wb_element_text__1303840578347_76">
                     <div>
                      <p>
                       Written for real women by real women,
                       <i>
                        Always in Style
                       </i>
                       is your personal roadmap to understanding fashion and to making the most of your look and lifestyle. Using clear instructions, examples and diagrams, women of all ages and sizes will be able to determine the styles, cuts, and patterns that work best for their body type, face shape and coloring. Spanning generations,
                       <i>
                        Always in Style
                       </i>
                       also includes advice on hairstyle, accessories and fragrance.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>

                        <!--[if gte mso 10]>
 
 <![endif]-->
                        <p class="MsoNormal" id="ext-gen6178">
                         Book Contents
                         <br/>
                         Four Steps to Becoming Well Dressed
                         <br/>
                         What is the Well Dressed Women
                         <br/>
                         Discovering Your Body Line
                         <br/>
                         What Clothing Line is Yours
                         <br/>
                         Clothing as an Extension of You
                         <br/>
                         The Power Of Color
                         <br/>
                         A Wardrobe Plan
                         <br/>
                         Hair and Makeup Advice
                         <br/>
                         Body Language
                        </p>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </td>
                  </tr>
                 </table>
                 <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_text__1328213590859_106" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                   <td align="left">
                    <div class="ic-element" id="wb_element_text__1328213590859_106">
                     <div>
                      <style>
                       /* Style Definitions */
  table.MsoNormalTable
 	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
 	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
 	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
 	mso-style-noshow:yes;
 	mso-style-priority:99;
 	mso-style-qformat:yes;
 	mso-style-parent:"";
 	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
 	mso-para-margin:0in;
 	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
 	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
 	font-size:11.0pt;
 	font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";
 	mso-ascii-font-family:Calibri;
 	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
 	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
 	mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
 	mso-hansi-font-family:Calibri;
 	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
 	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
 	mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-bidi;}
                      </style>
